text: Imba yapasi yaiva noupamhi hwamakubhiti mashanu6:6 mamita angaita 2.3, uyewo nomundima 10 ne 24 , imba yapakati yaiva noupamhi hwamakubhiti matanhatu6:6 mamita angaita 2.7 uye imba yechitatu yaiva namakubhiti manomwe6:6 mamita angaita 3.2. Nechokunze akavaka zvitakuriso kumativi kuti matanda arege kupinda mukati mamadziro etemberi.
